knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

# Intro

Read in the parquet files saved from the s2orc project.  Explore some of the data and see how things work.

```{r data}

dir <- here()

parquet_dir <- paste0(dir, "/data/pdf_parses/parquet/")
parquet_file <- paste0(parquet_dir,"pdf_text_0.parquet")
  
parquet_df <- read_parquet(parquet_file, as_data_frame = FALSE)

```

```{r}
subset <- parquet_df %>%
  dplyr::filter(row_number()<5) 
  
```
